net.ligreto.builders
Class ExcelReportBuilder

java.lang.Object
  net.ligreto.builders.ReportBuilder
      net.ligreto.builders.ExcelReportBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
BuilderInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
ExcelStreamReportBuilder
public class ExcelReportBuilder
extends ReportBuilder

This is the implementation of the BuilderInterface producing Microsoft Excel HSSF/XSSF files using Apache POI library. There are certain options that could be passed to this implementation. The supported options are:

  • autoFilter
  • autoSize
  • formatHeader
  • noDataFormat

Author:
Julius Stroffek

Field Detail

targetMap

protected java.util.Map<ExcelReportBuilder.TargetInfo,ExcelReportBuilder.TargetInfo> targetMap
The hash map that stores the last free row number for the specified target. It is used for append operation on the targets.

getTargetBuilder

public TargetInterface getTargetBuilder(java.lang.String target,
                                        boolean append)
                                 throws TargetException
Description copied from interface: BuilderInterface
This method will create the target builder used to build the result target.

Parameters:
target - the target location to set
append - indicates whether the data should be appended to target location
Throws:
InvalidTargetException - if the specified target is invalid
TargetException - if there is another problem creating the target
See Also:
TargetInterface

start

public void start()
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  LigretoException
Description copied from interface: BuilderInterface
The function called before the building of the report is started, i.e. function BuilderInterface.getTargetBuilder(java.lang.String, boolean) is called. It prepares the target builder, reads the template file if used, etc.

Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there is problem with I/O operations
LigretoException - if there is any other problem
